name: Jewels Jungle Game
description:
Jewels Jungle Game is a simple, yet quite polished and fun arrange-3 puzzle jewels marching game with much colorful effects than ever

Awesome Features
* Beautiful graphics and effects for you to enjoy.
* Hundreds of levels packed with shiny jewels, diamonds and precious gemstones.
* Easy and fun to play, but can be tricky to master at times!
* Suitable for all ages. Share the match-3 fun!
